abstract: Trevor Noah prepares for his debut as new Daily Show host by fine-tuning his humor at fourth and final run-through in front of test audience; South African stand-up comedian, chosen by Comedy Central network to replace Jon Stewart, hopes Americans will welcome his border crossing comedy at season premiere of show, which features refurbished stage and format.
lead_paragraph: The new “Daily Show,” which debuts on Monday night, will be a substantially different program, and yet, to gauge from this run-through, it has hardly changed at all.

headline.main: Trevor Noah Hosts His Final Test ‘Daily Show’
headline.print_headline: A New Anchor Tests the Waters

snippet: The new “Daily Show,” which debuts on Monday night, will be a substantially different program, and yet, to gauge from this run-through, it has hardly changed at all.
